author: Dr. Nancy A. Anoruo
title: As US struggles with lack of coronavirus testing, our sewage may provide clues
description: As the US struggles with lack of testing for the coronavirus, researchers look to our sewage for help.
content:
As the novel coronavirus continues to spread and devastate communities, the United States is still struggling to do enough testing to understand the true scale of the epidemic.
Now, researchers around the country are looking for new tools to help track how t… [+4297 chars]
